title: Update: She's Trying To Do This Behind Her Husband's Back...And We're Furious!
description:
Remember our listener Mallory? During the pandemic, her kids were at home with her, and it was driving her crazy. She wanted to send them back to school, but her husband was strongly against it.
She ended up sending the kids to school behind his back, and we were furious! What has happened since we last spoke to her? We have an update!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
